## TransactableLiquity.exitLiquidityMining() method

Withdraw all staked LP tokens from liquidity mining and claim reward.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
exitLiquidityMining(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base-u.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.
